channel.title: Make npcs face a direction on delta
channel.description:
Hello. I want to know how to make npcs face a different direction(North,south, east and west) on delta
Can anyone please tell me how to do this?
If you've got a TUT on it post it please as i couldn't find no TUTS on it
Thanks Much appreciated.
